My goal is to make sure my constituents can easily access and understand what Congress is working on. The Readable Legislation Act will lead to a better understanding of the proposals being considered in Congress and how taxpayer dollars are spent.

Readable legislation is a common practice in state legislatures across the country & clear language in bill text promotes transparency. Last week, I introduced the Readable Legislation Act in the House of Representatives. https://t.co/ONhGaUa7tH
